sentences: Eesti ajaloos oli keskaja oluline periood.
Eestis on palju muuseume, mis näitavad meie rahva ajaloos.
Tartu Ülikooli ajaloos on mitu tähtsat sündmust.
context: The word 'ajaloos' is the Estonian adessive case form of the noun 'aeg' meaning time, combined with the suffix '-lo-' which forms compound words related to time periods. When used as 'ajaloos', it means 'in history' or 'historically'. It indicates that something exists or happened within the context of historical time. The adessive case in Estonian typically answers the question 'millal?' (when?) but can also indicate location or context.
